violations.message: I'll analyze this code systematically against all violation patterns.FAIL: Line 1: Config Suppression Without Justification (`# mypy: ignore-errors` no multi-line comment); Line 52: Lazy Imports (logger imported at module-level but from loguru after path manipulation - acceptable E402 pattern); Line 87: Cleanup Suppression (`except: time.sleep(delay)` in _wait_for_openbao_health); Line 156: Exception → Empty Collection (init_cmd subprocess.run with check=False, no result validation); Line 239: Exception → False (is_service_available returns False for all OSError - sentinel); Line 327: Exception → Original Input (expand_env_vars returns obj unchanged when not dict/list/str with ${...} - implicit default via Truthiness); Line 333: Environment Implicit Default (`os.getenv(env_var, default)` - YAML defaults acceptable but Python-side not); Line 346: Environment Implicit Default (os.environ fallback chain for service configs); Line 414: Exception Suppression (try-except pass replaced by contextlib.suppress - still violation for asyncpg.UndefinedTableError); Line 423: Exception → logger.warning Only (`except Exception: logger.warning()` in _truncate_test_tables - no raise); Line 525: Exception → logger.warning Only (`except: logger.warning()` in cleanup_postgres_schema - no raise)
